items.title: Spiti Valley
items.excerpt: Cold desert, ancient monasteries, and the clearest skies I have ever seen. The kind of place that makes you feel very small and very alive at the same time.

items.title: Kolkata in Monsoon
items.excerpt: Rain on old buildings, the smell of petrichor on hot stone, and the particular quality of light that only exists in a city that has been loved for centuries.

items.title: Coorg
items.excerpt: Coffee estates, mist-covered hills, and the sound of rain on a tin roof. A slow, quiet kind of travel.
